attributes.action: Postpone the referendum until government stay neutral for all people in or out.
attributes.additional_details: Dividing a Country based on media hype instead of being educational and neutral with the facts for both votes is whats needed...... Postpone the referendum until we have that level of maturity and leadership to make the choice.
attributes.background: David Cameron and the house of commons needs to support this country and both vote boxes In or out...... Far right and far left are dividing this country and the people in the middle feel bullied ...who represents us?  Postpone the referendum and unite your country....equal representation is needed
